no.nsd.qddt.domain

Class ControllerWebIntegrationTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • no.nsd.qddt.domain.ControllerWebIntegrationTest
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgencyControllerTest, CategoryControllerTest, CommentControllerTest, ConceptControllerTest, ControlConstructControllerTest, GroupControllerTest, InstructionControllerTest, InstrumentControllerTest, OtherMaterialControllerTest, QuestionControllerTest, ResponseDomainCategoryControllerTest, ResponseDomainControllerTest, StudyControllerTest, SurveyProgramAuditControllerTest, SurveyProgramControllerTest, TopicGroupControllerTest

    @WebIntegrationTest
 @SpringApplicationConfiguration(classes=QDDT.class)
public abstract class ControllerWebIntegrationTest
extends java.lang.Object
    Sets up the test environment for a controller test that needs a IntegrationTest and Oauth2 tokens for headers when testing secured resources. Example on simple controller test public void simpleTest() throws Exception { mvc.perform(get(RESOURCE-PATH).header("Authorization", "Bearer " + accessToken)) .andExpect(status().isOk()); }
